tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QuantumHardwareComponents (
    component_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    manufacturer TEXT,
    serial_number TEXT,
    specification JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    component_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    specification TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE simulations (
    simulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT NOT NULL,
    simulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    simulation_date DATE,
    duration_hours INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES components(component_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_hardware_components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  year_of_manufacture INT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE component_specifications (
  spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_id INT REFERENCES quantum_hardware_components(component_id),
  spec_name VARCHAR(255),
  spec_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE simulations (
  simulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  spec_id INT REFERENCES component_specifications(spec_id),
  simulation_type VARCHAR(255),
  simulation_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE simulation_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  simulation_id INT REFERENCES simulations(simulation_id),
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE qubits (
    qubit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    qubit_name VARCHAR(100),
    qubit_type VARCHAR(50),
    qubit_properties JSON,
    qubit_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE gates (
    gate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gate_name VARCHAR(100),
    gate_type VARCHAR(50),
    gate_matrix JSON,
    gate_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE simulations (
    simulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    simulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    simulation_type VARCHAR(50),
    simulation_parameters JSON,
    simulation_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    device_properties JSON,
    device_description TEXT
);
